about_the_game:
Currently in development; Dutch Maximus: Out of the Toy Box is a fast paced first person platformer with a cinematic story and action packed gameplay! Help save Toytopia as Dutch Maximus, an 80's cartoon action hero turned modern day action figure, as he takes on a familiar foe from his past TV adventures!

Key Features

  • Fast-paced Parkour Gameplay
  • Multiple worlds, each with their own unique visual and gameplay style
  • You are the toy!
  • A focus on mastery, strive to improve your time
  • Fully animated cinematic story

Parkour




Highly trained, use Dutch's signature parkour skills to slide run and jump over the bad guys out maneuvering them at every turn.

Grapple Hook




Use Dutch's trusty Slapling hook to pull yourself closer to enemies and out of sticky sitations bringing you closer to the action than ever before!

Slime Gun




Slime enemies and stop them in their tracks gaining a bonus to your time and bringing you closer to beating the level and improving your time!

Fully articulate and 6 inches tall you are the toy, you play through a vast array of unique toy sets as you strive to rescue your team of toy friends from the clutches of your old nemesis

name: Dutch Maximus: Out Of The Toy Box

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nividia GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3500x
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A first person parkour platformer where you play as a child's beloved action figure, as you maneuver through the world with speed. Using wall running, sliding, grappling and other advanced movement to traverse unique and imaginary places.
